item.title: At Novopavlivka direction Russian army shelled Krasnohorivka, Heorhiyivka, Paraskoviyivka, Vuhledar of Donetsk region. Russia... (LiveUAMap)
item.description: At Novopavlivka direction Russian army shelled Krasnohorivka, Heorhiyivka, Paraskoviyivka, Vuhledar of Donetsk region. Russian aviation conducted airstrikes at Novomykhaylivka and Vodyane of Donetsk region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report

item.title: Ukrainian military had 54 combat engagements with Russian forces near Terny of Donetsk region and Bilohorivka of Luhansk regi... (LiveUAMap)
item.description: Ukrainian military had 54 combat engagements with Russian forces near Terny of Donetsk region and Bilohorivka of Luhansk region, Klischiyivka, Andriyivka, Stupochky and south to Chasiv Yar of Donetsk region, Berdychi, Orlivka, Tonenke, Pervomayske and Nevelske of Donetsk region, Krasnohorivka, Heorhiyivka, Novomykhaylivka and Pobyeda of Donetsk region, Robotyne, Staromayorske and nort-west Verbove of Zaporizhzhia region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
